body_text:
I like these tests!
I think we should add some tests for stableSample like these that aren't at 100% or 0%, so that we'll know in the future if we break the way input is hashed and could cause currently-running recipes to be sent to different users than they were before.
body:
I like these tests!

I think we should add some tests for stableSample like these that aren't at 100% or 0%, so that we'll know in the future if we break the way input is hashed and could cause currently-running recipes to be sent to different users than they were before.
body_html:
I like these tests!

I think we should add some tests for stableSample like these that aren't at 100% or 0%, so that we'll know in the future if we break the way input is hashed and could cause currently-running recipes to be sent to different users than they were before.
